EmailTemplate.name: EMEA_Event_Dell Tech Summit_Spain_Q318.EMEA Dell Tech Summit Post Event Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Continue your conversation with Pivotal
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for visiting Pivotal’s booth during the Dell Tech Summit in Madrid. We hope your chat with Nicolas and Ulrich, Platforms Architects at Pivotal, were educational and useful.
Did you know that Pivotal build a landing page designed exclusively for Dell Tech teams? Check it out now <[[https://partners.pivotal.io/English/General_DT_Info.aspx]]>!
Are you aware that the Pivotal Opportunity Registration tool allows you to quickly submit a qualified customer opportunity and receive Pivotal support? Learn more about this tool <[[https://www.surveygizmo.com/s3/4453835/Pivotal-Opportunity-Registration]]>.
Stay in touch with Pivotal through the weekly newsletter Dell 5 Point Friday. Register for the newsletter <[[https://partners.pivotal.io/English/General_DT_Info.aspx]]>(at the bottom of the landing page).
Reach out to Fabio, Ulrich and Martin who are dedicated to building with you joint solutions and sharing expertise to enable true transformation and game changing advantages for your customers.
South EMEA Fabio Chiodini Advisory Platform Architect EMEA +39 3454777900 fchiodini@pivotal.io <[[mailto:fchiodini@pivotal.io]]>
Central EMEA Ulrich Hoelscher Senior Platform Architect EMEA +49 15164967868 uhoelscher@pivotal.io <[[mailto:uhoelscher@pivotal.io]]>
UK & Ireland Martin McVay Senior Platform Architect EMEA +44 7880088167 mmcvay@pivotal.io <[[mailto:mmcvay@pivotal.io]]>
Speak to you soon! Fabio, Ulrich, Martin
